channel.title: Homes on JHCUI
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on JHCUI

item.description: I am an Assistant Professor in the School of Computer Science and Technology at xxx University. Before that, I received my PhD in the School of Electronic and Information Engineering at Xi’an Jiaotong University in 2018. My research focuses on improving performance, reliability of storage systems. I’m looking for motivated students. If you are interested in doing research with me, please feel free to contact me via email. Recent News Aug 2018 ：I will be joining CS department @ xxxx in Fall 2018

item.title: Publications
item.description: Jinhua Cui, Youtao Zhang, Liang Shi, Chun Jason Xue, Weiguo Wu, and Jun Yang. ApproxFTL: On the Performance and Lifetime Improvement of 3D NAND Flash based SSDs. IEEE Transactions on Computer-Aided Design of Integrated Circuits and Systems (TCAD), 2017. Jinhua Cui, Youtao Zhang, Weiguo Wu, Jun Yang, Yinfeng Wang, and Jianhang Huang. DLV: Exploiting Device Level Latency Variations for Performance Improvement on Flash Memory Storage Systems. IEEE Transactions on Computer-Aided Design of Integrated Circuits and Systems (TCAD), 2017.

item.title: Patents

Wei Wei, Weiguo Wu, and Jinhua Cui. A Data Block Placement Strategy in HDFS based on Historical Information. Patent No.: 201410475802.8, Date:06/20/2017. Zhangfeng Duan, Weiguo Wu, Depei Qian, and Jinhua Cui. A Read-optimized T-Tree Index in Memory Database. Patent No.: 201410122539.4, Date:06/20/2017.
